title: Acer - One 10 - 10.1" - Intel Atom - 32GB  S1002-145A 2-IN-1  (Small Review )
description:
Acer - One 10 - 10.1" - Intel Atom - 32GB - With Keyboard - Silver

Intel Atom Z3735F processor (quad-core 1.33 GHz)
10.1" WXGA (1280 x 800) IPS touch display
2 GB DDR3 memory
32 GB Flash storage with microSD card slot
8400 mAh battery
Windows 8.1 with Bing operating system

Keyboard must be used for regular usb
Micro HDMI output with HDCP support
